title: Spellbook of magic mapping
data:
| [spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") of +   magic mapping   [![Light green spellbook.png](/images/7/7d/Light_green_spellbook.png)](/wiki/File:Light_green_spellbook.png) |                                                                                    |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                                   | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance")                      |
| Abundance                                                                                                                                                                    | [1.83%](/wiki/Spellbook#Generation "Spellbook")                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                    |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                                   | 500 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                  |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                                       | [50](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                        |
| Turns to read                                                                                                                                                                | 35                                                                                 |
| Ink to write                                                                                                                                                                 | [25–49](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker")                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                    |
| Spell type                                                                                                                                                                   | [divination](/wiki/Divination_spells "Divination spells")                          |
| Level                                                                                                                                                                        | 5                                                                                  |
| Power cost                                                                                                                                                                   | 25 [Pw](/wiki/Power "Power")                                                       |
| Direction                                                                                                                                                                    | non-directional                                                                    |
| Equivalent                                                                                                                                                                   | [scroll of magic mapping](/wiki/Scroll_of_magic_mapping "Scroll of magic mapping") |
| Special for                                                                                                                                                                  | [archaeologist](/wiki/Archaeologist "Archaeologist")                               |

In *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, a **spellbook of magic mapping** allows you to learn the **spell of magic mapping**. It is the [special spell](/wiki/Special_spell "Special spell") for [archeologists](/wiki/Archeologist "Archeologist").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Effects](#Effects)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 History](#History)
- [4 References](#References)

## Effects

The spell reveals the entire map (although it does not fully reveal the contents of rooms), the same as an uncursed [scroll of magic mapping](/wiki/Scroll_of_magic_mapping "Scroll of magic mapping"); all of the level's walls and corridors, as well as all staircases on the level are shown. Secret passages are revealed, but secret doors are not.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

The spell will also reveal the current location of the [magic portal](/wiki/Magic_portal "Magic portal") on the [Plane of Water](/wiki/Plane_of_Water "Plane of Water") if the player has formally located it before using confused [gold detection](/wiki/Gold_detection "Gold detection") or a [crystal ball](/wiki/Crystal_ball "Crystal ball").

## Strategy

It is most popular for making it easier to traverse [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom")'s vast mazes. Although useful on its own, it becomes even more useful when combined with any one of the following spells:

- [Detect monsters](/wiki/Spellbook_of_detect_monsters "Spellbook of detect monsters") allows players to head directly for, or avoid, certain enemies.
- [Detect unseen](/wiki/Spellbook_of_detect_unseen "Spellbook of detect unseen") reveals traps on the level, making traversing it even less dangerous.
- [Detect treasure](/wiki/Spellbook_of_detect_treasure "Spellbook of detect treasure") and [Detect food](/wiki/Spellbook_of_detect_food "Spellbook of detect food") add another layer of detail to the level overview.
- [Teleportation](/wiki/Teleportation "Teleportation") and [teleport control](/wiki/Teleport_control "Teleport control") in tandem with this spell notably allows players to traverse whole levels in seconds (provided the floor allows it) by zipping to the exit stair almost instantaneously, or else quickly covering points of interest.

The spell is also useful on the ascension run to save time if the player has fallen past levels through [holes](/wiki/Hole "Hole") or [trapdoors](/wiki/Trapdoor "Trapdoor").

## History

The ability to reveal the portal on the Plane of Water was added in [3.6.1](/wiki/3.6.1 "3.6.1").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [read.c in NetHack 3.4.3, line 1092](/wiki/Source:NetHack_3.4.3/read.c#line1092 "Source:NetHack 3.4.3/read.c")

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.4. Click here for more information.](/images/3/37/Nh364-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.4. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.4](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.4 "NetHack 3.6.4"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-364}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Spellbook of magic mapping

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
spellbook of
+   magic mapping  
Appearance random
Abundance 1.83%
Base price 500 zm
Weight 50
Turns to read 35
Ink to write 25–49
Spell type divination
Level 5
Power cost 25 Pw
Direction non-directional
Equivalent scroll of magic mapping
Special for archaeologist

In NetHack, a spellbook of magic mapping allows you to learn the spell of magic mapping. It is the special spell for archeologists.

Contents

  • 1 Effects
  • 2 Strategy
  • 3 History
  • 4 References

Effects

The spell reveals the entire map (although it does not fully reveal the contents of rooms), the same as an uncursed scroll of magic mapping; all of the level's walls and corridors, as well as all staircases on the level are shown. Secret passages are revealed, but secret doors are not.[1]

The spell will also reveal the current location of the magic portal on the Plane of Water if the player has formally located it before using confused gold detection or a crystal ball.

Strategy

It is most popular for making it easier to traverse Gehennom's vast mazes. Although useful on its own, it becomes even more useful when combined with any one of the following spells:

  • Detect monsters allows players to head directly for, or avoid, certain enemies.
  • Detect unseen reveals traps on the level, making traversing it even less dangerous.
  • Detect treasure and Detect food add another layer of detail to the level overview.
  • Teleportation and teleport control in tandem with this spell notably allows players to traverse whole levels in seconds (provided the floor allows it) by zipping to the exit stair almost instantaneously, or else quickly covering points of interest.

The spell is also useful on the ascension run to save time if the player has fallen past levels through holes or trapdoors.

History

The ability to reveal the portal on the Plane of Water was added in 3.6.1.

References

  1. ↑ read.c in NetHack 3.4.3, line 1092

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.6.4. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-364}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

{{spellbook|name=magic mapping|level=5|type=divination|turns=35|direction=non-directional|equiv=[[scroll of magic mapping]]|abundance=1.83%|role=archaeologist}}
In ''[[NetHack]]'', a '''spellbook of magic mapping''' allows you to learn the '''spell of magic mapping'''. It is the [[special spell]] for [[archeologist]]s.

==Effects==
The spell reveals the entire map (although it does not fully reveal the contents of rooms), the same as an uncursed [[scroll of magic mapping]]; all of the level's walls and corridors, as well as all staircases on the level are shown. Secret passages are revealed, but secret doors are not.{{refsrc|read.c|1092}}

The spell will also reveal the current location of the [[magic portal]] on the [[Plane of Water]] if the player has formally located it before using confused [[gold detection]] or a [[crystal ball]].

==Strategy==
It is most popular for making it easier to traverse [[Gehennom]]'s vast mazes. Although useful on its own, it becomes even more useful when combined with any one of the following spells:
*{{spell of|Detect monsters}} allows players to head directly for, or avoid, certain enemies.
*{{spell of|Detect unseen}} reveals traps on the level, making traversing it even less dangerous.
*{{spell of|Detect treasure}} and {{spell of|Detect food}} add another layer of detail to the level overview.
*[[Teleportation]] and [[teleport control]] in tandem with this spell notably allows players to traverse whole levels in seconds (provided the floor allows it) by zipping to the exit stair almost instantaneously, or else quickly covering points of interest.

The spell is also useful on the ascension run to save time if the player has fallen past levels through [[hole]]s or [[trapdoor]]s.

==History==
The ability to reveal the portal on the Plane of Water was added in [[3.6.1]].
